UI_TEXT.警告: 无法导入 nunchaku.lora.flux.to_diffusers: Warning: Could not import nunchaku.lora.flux.to_diffusers. The ZML_Name LoRA Loader (Nunchaku) node will not work. Please ensure the nunchaku library is installed (ignore if not using nunchaku).
UI_TEXT.警告: to_diffusers 功能缺失，无法解析 {path}: Warning: to_diffusers functionality missing, unable to parse {path}
UI_TEXT.此节点用于解析LoRA模型文件，并从Civitai.com获取关联的元数据。\n:
This node parses LoRA model files and fetches associated metadata from Civitai.com.
1. Select a LoRA model.
2. Check the items to save (Image, Trigger Words, Description).
3. Run the node.
4. The node automatically calculates the file hash, accesses the Civitai API, and saves the fetched files to the 'zml' subfolder in the LoRA's directory.
UI_TEXT.Civitai上没有找到预览图。: No preview image found on Civitai.
UI_TEXT.Civitai上没有找到触发词。: No trigger words found on Civitai.
UI_TEXT.无法从Civitai获取此LoRA的信息（可能未上传或哈希不匹配）。: Could not fetch info for this LoRA from Civitai (possibly not uploaded or hash mismatch).
UI_TEXT.未执行任何保存操作。\n请开启至少一个保存选项后重新运行。:
No save action performed.
Please enable at least one save option and re-run.
UI_TEXT.'lora名称列表' 输入不是一个有效的列表类型，跳过LoRA加载。: 'LoRA Name List' input is not a valid list type, skipping LoRA loading.
UI_TEXT.'lora名称列表' 输入不是有效的JSON格式，跳过LoRA加载。: 'LoRA Name List' input is not valid JSON format, skipping LoRA loading.
UI_TEXT.LoRA文件 '{lora_name}' 未找到或不存在，跳过。: LoRA file '{lora_name}' not found or does not exist, skipping.
UI_TEXT.处理 LoRA '{lora_name}' 时发生意外错误: {e}: An unexpected error occurred while processing LoRA '{lora_name}': {e}
UI_TEXT.ZML_名称加载lora: 'lora名称列表' 中的LoRA信息格式不正确:: ZML_Name LoRA Loader: LoRA info format in 'LoRA Name List' is incorrect: {lora_info}, skipping.
UI_TEXT.模型包装器的类名不是 'ComfyFluxWrapper'。: Model wrapper's class name is not 'ComfyFluxWrapper'.
UI_TEXT.错误: ZML_名称加载lora(nunchaku) 节点的输入模型结构不正确: Error: ZML_Name LoRA Loader (Nunchaku) node's input model structure is incorrect ({e}). Please ensure it is loaded by Nunchaku FLUX DiT Loader.
